welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shenley Brook End, the picturesque town known for its charming architecture and serene surroundings. We hope you have a wonderful stay and make unforgettable memories exploring all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Luton Airport Parkway Terminal
terminals.description: Located next to the Luton Airport Parkway train station, this terminal provides easy access to the airport for passengers arriving by train.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Benson Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights at Benson Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
